titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 1458) to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to establish time limitations on certain civil actions against aircraft manufacturers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Hansen. Petition No: 103-21.

bill.summary: 4/13/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 1458 (establishing time limitations on certain civil actions against aircraft manufacturers).
